body_html:
The PR #12971 is still pending. I was finally able to find a Windows VM image from Microsoft:
https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/downloads/virtual-machines

And it comes with Visual Studio 2017 already. However, when I tried to build TensorFlow with bazel on Windows, it just hangs at the dependency library stage. Will need more time to figure out if bazel is working on Windows or not.

body:
The PR #12971 is still pending. I was finally able to find a Windows VM image from Microsoft:
https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/downloads/virtual-machines

And it comes with Visual Studio 2017 already. However, when I tried to build TensorFlow with bazel on Windows, it just hangs at the dependency library stage. Will need more time to figure out if bazel is working on Windows or not.
